page.title: 15Tourism In Mayfield.
page.content: Mayfield has a lot of visitors,mostly in the Summer,because it is a very typical 'old_world' English village, surrounded by beautiful countryside.It is a very good base for touring both Kent & Sussex.Mayfield has one hotel, The Middle House,built in the 16th century.There are also 5 public houses,a restaurant,tea_rooms,2 guest houses,& B&B accommodation in one of the public houses.Many of the visitors to Mayfield come from abroad,mostly from America,but French,Dutch,Irish & Spanish etc.as well as British people come here.During the Winter Mayfield has fewer visitors but The Middle House often has conference groups & the restaurant is always busy.Parents of the College & Convent children also use the tourist facilities.Many visitors just spend a few hours in Mayfield to explore the lovely village
